    Ollie Chick, Samuel Pell

      • setGender

        public void setGender(java.lang.String gender)
        Sets the gender of an animal.
        Parameters:
        gender - can be either "male" or "female"
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the gender is not "male" or "female"

      • play

        public void play(Toy toy,
                 int fatigueIncrease,
                 int harshness)
        The pet plays with the toy. Their happiness will increase or decrease. Their fatigue will increase. Their mischievousness will decrease or increase. Their hunger will increase. Also, the toy's durability will decrease.
        Parameters:
        toy - the toy the pet plays with

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        The pet sleeps. Their fatigue will decrease.

      • goToilet

        public void goToilet(double defaultWeight)
        The pet goes toilet. Their percent bladder full will decrease to 0. Their weight will return to normal.

      • feed

        public void feed(Food food,
                 int bladderSize)
        The pet eats food. Their hunger will decrease. Their weight will increase. Their percent bladder full will increase. Their happiness will increase or decrease. Their health will increase or decrease.
        Parameters:
        food - the food the pet eats

      • misbehave

        public void misbehave()
        Their happiness will decrease.

      • beSick

        void beSick()
        The pet is sick.

      • die

        void die()
        The pet dies. They can no longer be revived.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representation of the pet

      • getDatumFromFile

        public java.lang.String getDatumFromFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                         java.lang.String heading,
                                         java.lang.String row)
        Read the file form the path inputed and selects the data necessary.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File to read from
        heading - Name of the column in the data file
        row - The name of the item
        Returns:
        datum wanted

      • increaseValue

        private int increaseValue(int increase,
                          int valueToIncrease)
        This is a private function called by the increasers to make sure they stay within 0-100
        Parameters:
        increase - This is how much to increase the value by
        valueToIncrease - This is the initial value
        Returns:
        the new value
